the Great Hall of the People in Beijing
to gather happily under one roof
overt/to make no secret (of one's presence)/grandiose/with great scope

sentences.english: Can a first cousin at one remove inherit the property?
sentences.chinese: 在堂表兄弟姐妹這一輩當中，他是唯一的男孩。

sentences.english: More weeks of life-saving Church, I wish everyone good health.
sentences.chinese: 愈周救生堂，祝願人人身體健康。

sentences.english: He was the first one graduated in China medical school and became a practitioner i…
sentences.chinese: 他還是第一個取得香港行醫執照的中國醫學堂畢業生。

sentences.english: Two hulking men bar the way, and T-Bag is ejected from the church.
sentences.chinese: 兩個猛男擋住他的路，西奧多被從教堂裏趕了出來。

sentences.english: Suspects accused of trying to carry out a bomb plot against New Yorks appeared in court.
sentences.chinese: 被指控密謀試圖炸燬紐約猶太教堂的疑犯出席聽證會。

sentences.english: All information and data contained in this Website is complied only for the members of On Fook Church for reference.
sentences.chinese: 本網站所載的資料祗供安福堂及其會員參考。

sentences.english: Wieden & Kennedy and Hakuhodo also decline to comment.
sentences.chinese: 威登肯尼迪和博報堂也拒絕發表評論。

sentences.english: He himself kept two dogs, Hector and Dan.
sentences.chinese: 他自己養了兩條狗，赫克託和堂。
堂和帕吉是舞蹈演員嗎？

sentences.english: How often do you purchase Herbal Tea Series drinks?
sentences.chinese: 你一個月會買多少次鴻福堂的涼茶系列的飲品？

sentences.english: My cousin is not part of my nuclear household.
sentences.chinese: 我的堂表兄弟姊妹並否則核心家裏成員的一部份。

sentences.english: Chong Sheng Hall designs elegant and possesses Southern architectural features.
sentences.chinese: 崇聖堂設計格調高雅，具有南方建築特色。

sentences.english: He's very deserving to be in the Hall of Fame.
sentences.chinese: 他能進名士堂，這一點也不特別。

sentences.english: The ear canal will appear dirty with red or black ear wax.
sentences.chinese: 該外耳道堂骯髒與紅色或黑色耳蠟。

sentences.english: This offer is only available at Wan Chai clinic of CCMC.
sentences.chinese: 此優惠只適用於康德堂灣仔診所。

sentences.english: The paradise was already Alices playground.
sentences.chinese: 這天堂已經是愛麗絲的遊樂場。
